ygData.subject: Re: lvl 16 spell availability
ygData.msgSnippet: I found Restless Bones in the Neriak guild, as for Banshee Aura I tink that is research only.  Feign Death is available but I am not sure if it is in the
ygData.messageBody:
I found Restless Bones in the Neriak guild, as for Banshee Aura I tink that
is research only. Feign Death is available but I am not sure if it is in
the Neriak Guild.


> Greetings,
>
> I just made lvl 16 and have been unable to locate restless bones,
> feign death, and banshee aura in the neriak necro guild. Are
> these research only spells now or are they available elsewhere still?
> Also, I bought the Diabolique book but can't read but the
> occasional work. What language do I need to learn to be able to
> read this book? Thanks!
>
> Grymspine
> Dark Alliance
> Mithaniel Marr
>
